message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, see what Bob says
I'll give you 20% of the money, but I think you can do better than that!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm taking the majority
I'll give you 40% of the money, but I'm trying to get a better deal than last time!
You're getting desperate, I can see it. I'm taking the lion's share now
I'll give you 60% of the money, but I'm not going to give up yet!
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my last offer
I'll give you 70% of the money, but I'm not going to settle for this low of an offer!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it
I'll give you 75% of the money, but I'm not going to give up without a fight!
This is my last offer, take it or leave it. I'm not going to give you anything more
I'll give you 98% of the money, but I'm not going to accept this ridiculously unfair offer!
